subject: Info required on Test Listeners
msgSnippet: Hello, Is there any documentation available on how to use Test Listeners in Junit. I wanted to know more about how to exactly write test listenrs for Junit. (I
messageBody:
Hello,

Is there any documentation available on how to use Test Listeners in Junit.

I wanted to know more about how to exactly write test listenrs for Junit.
(I want to trigger some events based on the output of individual test cases as and when the output of a test case is available).

Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

Regards
Kanwaljit Singh

-----Original Message-----
From: junit Moderator [mailto:junit-owner@yahoogroups.com]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 2004 09:28 AM
To: Singh, Kanwaljit
Subject: Welcome to junit
